Title: Palermo or Wolfsburg
Writer: Werner Schroeter (screenplay), Giuseppe Fava (screenplay), Orazio Torrisi (dialogue), Werner Schroeter (dialogue), Klaus Dethloff (dialogue: law)
Actors: Nicola Zarbo, Otto Sander, Ida Di Benedetto, Magdalena Montezuma
Plot: An impoverished young man from Sicily travels to Wolfsburg, West Germany to find work. He takes a job in the Volkswagen factory after he travels through Northern Italy by train.
